title: Drawing, 1912-12-202, 1863–64
medium:
Recto: Graphite on brown paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and slight traces of watercolor on brown paper
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite?, across bottom margin with color notations for an indistinct object:  Black / Blue / Laque / white
Verso: Inscribed in graphite? in opposite direction, at top: Blueish / grey; opal; grey / purple / Warm grey; Pink.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of drummers resting before tents and drums stacken on ground, with high top, bottom and broad right margins.
Verso: In opposite direction at top is a sketch of a sky and at the bottom are the back of a man's hat with a roughly sketched head and a rough sketch of a mounted soldier.

exhibitions.title: Winslow Homer Paintings of the Civil War
